column4: hey if you were making a file server reachable by both nix and windows computers, the same directory....what would you go with?
is there a way to go NFS all the wya?

IF you guys were setting up a file server strictly to share files to windows and linux machines, would you create a user, then a subdirectory of it, or is it safe to create a directory one level off of root and give it permissions?
I personally would create a user account, just old school
